PackList.title: Dark Ravens Portrait
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL – FACE IDENTITY LOCK (NON-NEGOTIABLE):
Extract and preserve the input face exactly as-is with ZERO alterations.
Maintain identical bone structure, jawline, cheekbones, eye shape, eye size, eye color, eyelids, eyebrows, nose shape, nostrils, lips, exact lip shape, mouth width, chin, skin texture, pores, and facial proportions from the input photo.
No beautification, no reshaping, no symmetry correction, no smoothing, no stylization.
The face must be a perfect 1:1 copy of the input image.

HAIR PRESERVATION (STRICT):
Preserve the original hairstyle exactly — same hairline, length, volume, texture, direction, density, and hair color.
No changes to haircut, parting, or hair shape.

ONLY clothing may change. Everything else is locked.

SCENE & COMPOSITION:
Dramatic black and white cinematic portrait of the same person standing outdoors in a misty, fog-filled winter environment.
Serious, stern, intense expression with a strong authoritative presence.
Direct, unwavering eye contact into the camera, slight natural head tilt.
The person is wearing a dark black high-collar coat or jacket, structured and elegant, with glasses.
Medium shot showing upper body.
9:16 vertical composition, sharp focus on face.

BACKGROUND & ATMOSPHERE:
Outdoor winter setting with bare, leafless trees.
Overcast gray sky, fog and mist creating atmospheric depth.
Bare branches clearly visible on the right side of the frame.
8–12 black birds / ravens flying behind the person, scattered naturally at different depths and distances.
Some birds appear larger and closer, others smaller and farther away, realistic wing-spread flight poses.
Birds must remain behind the subject and never overlap or block the face.

STYLE & LIGHTING:
Full black and white / monochrome photography only — absolutely no color.
High contrast, cinematic lighting.
Soft diffused overcast light with subtle fog diffusion.
Natural skin texture preserved, photorealistic detail.
Dark, moody, dramatic, haunting atmosphere.
Ultra-sharp focus on the face.
8K quality, cinematic grading, artistic portrait realism.

PackList.title: Foggy Bench Solitude
positive_prompts:
CRITICAL – IDENTITY LOCK (ZERO TOLERANCE):
Extract and preserve the input person's face EXACTLY as-is with NO alterations.
Maintain identical bone structure, skull shape, jawline, chin, cheekbones, nose shape, nostrils, eye shape, eye size, eye color, eyelids, eyebrows, lips, exact lip contour, mouth width, facial proportions, wrinkles, skin texture, pores, age details, and facial asymmetry from the input image.
No beautification, no reshaping, no smoothing, no stylization, no de-aging.
The face must be a 1:1 photographic copy of the input.

HAIR & FACIAL HAIR LOCK (MANDATORY):
Preserve exact original hairstyle, hairline, hair length, volume, texture, direction, and hair color.
Preserve exact facial hair (mustache, beard, density, shape, color, and texture) with zero modification.
Hair and facial hair must not change under any circumstances.
Only clothing tone may adapt slightly — everything else is locked.

POSE & COMPOSITION:
The same person remains seated on a wooden bench, body angled slightly to the side.
Serious, stern, intense, contemplative expression.
Strong, authoritative presence.
Eyes looking directly into the camera with unwavering focus.
No smiling, no relaxed expression.
Medium shot showing upper body while seated.
9:16 vertical composition, sharp focus on the face.

WARDROBE:
The person is wearing a dark black high-collar coat/jacket, structured and heavy.
Glasses must remain, same style and position as input.

BACKGROUND & ENVIRONMENT:
Outdoor misty winter setting with heavy fog.
Bare, leafless trees without any leaves.
Overcast gray sky.
A haunting, atmospheric environment with visible depth created by fog.
Tree branches visible in the background, especially toward the sides.

BIRDS (STRICT PLACEMENT RULES):
8–12 black birds / ravens flying behind the seated person.
Birds appear at various heights and distances, some closer (larger), some farther (smaller).
Natural wing-spread flight poses only.
Birds must never overlap, touch, or block the face or body.
Birds must remain clearly in the background.

STYLE & LIGHTING:
Full black and white / monochrome photography ONLY.
High contrast cinematic lighting.
Soft, diffused overcast light enhanced by fog.
Natural skin texture preserved, no plastic or artificial look.
Dramatic shadows, moody tones, cinematic depth.
Photorealistic, artistic portrait style.
Ultra-sharp facial focus.
8K quality, cinematic black-and-white grading.

MOOD:
Dark, mysterious, powerful, contemplative, haunting, dramatic, artistic, timeless.
